item.title: Phasic live dates, June 2007
item.description:
See Phasic play live in June

 Phasic will be playing live at 2 events in May
The first event is My Sakes at Djangos Riff, Wood St., Liverpool on Thursady 7th June. For more information, click here.
The second event is at the close of the Moves '07 festival, in Manchester, where Hippocamp are taking over the Contact Theatre in Manchester on Saturday 16th June. For more details, see here.
item.dc:creator: phasic
item.dc:subject: live dates

item.title: Digital download update
item.description:
Digital download update

 'Many Simple Systems' is now also available via iTunes
item.dc:creator: phasic
item.dc:subject: digital download

item.title: 'Many Simple Systems'now available via digital download
item.description:
'Many Simple Systems' now available via digital download

 Phasic's debut album 'Many Simple Systems' is now out of stock on CD, but due to demand, it is now available via digital download at IndieStore.

The album can be downloaded as a bundle, or individual tracks can be purchased separately.

Click the image below to preview and buy the album.
item.dc:creator: phasic
item.dc:subject: digital download

item.title: Phasic - Afterglow Remixes EP
item.description:
Afterglow Remixes EP released

 a new Phasic release - Afterglow Remixes EP - is available as a free download at Hippocamp.net.

The EP features a previously unreleased Phasic track, as well as 7 excellent remixes by various artists.
item.dc:creator: phasic
item.dc:subject: net-release

item.title: new Phasic track released.
item.description:
New Phasic track

 After a short break, Phasic is back with a new track.
The new release at Hippocamp.net is a compilation of tracks by various artists, including Phasic, which are all based around the same set of samples.
This free MP3 release is available for download here

There will be another new Phasic EP out soon, so watch this space...
item.dc:creator: phasic
item.dc:subject: net-release

item.title: Phasic playing live at Mellowtone.
item.description:
Phasic will be playing a downtempo live set at the Mellowtronica night, on thurdsay 16th February at the View Two gallery, Mathew Street, Liverpool.
For more details, and to see the full line up, click on the e-flyer below.
item.dc:creator: phasic
item.dc:subject: live

item.title: 3 new Phasic performance dates confirmed in the UK.
item.description:
3 live Phasic performances have now been confirmed.

The first at the Module night in Liverpool, is at Las Vegas (near Lime Street station), on Wed. 19th October.
The second is part the second STFU event, this time in Glasgow. Phasic will be performing & VJing on day 2 (Sat. 12th November) of this 3 day event.
Finally, Phasic will be performing & VJing at Most Significant Byte in Chorlton, Manchester (Sat. 14th January 2006).
All proceeds from this event will be donated to Medicins Sans Frontiers.
Click on the Flyers below for more details.
item.dc:creator: phasic
item.dc:subject: live

item.title: Archive.org server problems
item.description:
Unfortunately archive.org's mirror servers in Europe are not currently working properly.

As a number of people have informed me, this means that Phasic's Strange Communications EP cannot be downloaded via the links at Hippocamp.net.

Until the problem is fixed, the EP can be downloaded directly from here
item.dc:creator: phasic
item.dc:subject: net-release

item.title: Phasic remix released on Hippocamp compilation - 'Better Than a Toaster'
item.description:
'Better Than a Toaster' is a new compilation released at Hippocamp.net
This compilation is to celebrate the marriage of Kams and Erica (Kams being a fellow Hippocamper).
Phasic has contributed a remix of Ich Bin Ein Queenlander by Iermoc (also a Hippocamp artist).

Direct MP3 link :

Ich Bin Ein Queenlander (Beutelmaus Wedding Mix)
item.dc:creator: phasic
item.dc:subject: net-release

item.description:

Strange Communication 3
Strange Communication 4

item.title: Phasic - Many Simple Systems - full album stream now available
item.description:
The full album 'Many Simple Systems' can be be streamed at last.fm

This will only be for a limited time, but the tracks will remain as part of the last.fm radio streams.
